name: Army Commando Secret Mission
description:
Play this Army commando secret mission with more shooting and action games. In this game you are on a secret mission which is assign by you from seniors Army officers. so Win with the help of well-trained special task force commandos and spies. They are front-line commandos, highly skilled deadly people, they are all iron and steel! You can use their services to clear the enemy's area and follow up for the troops.

You capture enemy bases to destroy their communication systems with enemy headquarters. After the destruction of the communication system, head to the headquarters, seize the headquarters. In this war, use your professional assault skills. You can use different backstab techniques (such as boxing) and weapons (pistols, sniper rifles and knives) to get down the enemy's power.

The game features:

- Super Fighting Fun
- Realistic enemy behavior
- Each task has a different goal
- Multiple enemy characters
- Use a sniper rifle at a distance
- The real military base environment
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Unique control system
Excellent sound effects hope you like!
